attributes.additional_details:
recently a housing association called Colne Housing has applied to build Council houses on the land of the old Bernard factory site!

We as a community say NO to this proposal as there is no jobs being made and more of hard workers tax will be put into this build!

In the long term if the build goes ahead vandalism will increase, antisocial behaviour and criminal activity as we have seen in the past when we have let people move into the area!

Yes there is a waiting list of mostly single mums and people with problems but that is down to their choices  and life styles, as Tax payers we shouldn't fit the bill!
